thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Michele

author: Michele
title: Michele
text: I have just completed a two month house-sit in Blandford Forum and I thoroughly enjoyed every moment of it. The home-owners prepared a detailed information pack for me before they left; their home is a lovely, modern, well-equipped, well-maintained property with beautiful countryside views and friendly, helpful neighbours; and their cat is a sociable, undemanding companion who it was a pleasure to share the house-sit with. I stayed in regular contact with the home-owners throughout the two months via email, which I think worked very well for us both, without feeling excessive. I highly recommend this house-sit to others and would be delighted to house-sit there again in the future, if our timings coincide again.
